content: a delicate botanical-inspired lace block featuring the **climbing vines** motif **pattern includes ** * full knitting chart * row-by-row written instructions this pattern was released as part of the **lace into spring mkal 2026 ** it is designed to be compatible with other squares in the lace into spring series you can purchase this pattern individually or as part of the full ebook collection 1 you re welcome to join our ravelry group 2 to chat and share your progress 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lace-into-spring-mkal-2026
